Header: Firstquarter of the Southern Expressway from Matara to Hambantota will be opened before April this year
Content: Minister Johnston Fernando has pointed out that the work on the first quarter of the Southern Expressway from Matara to Hambantota will be completed and would be vested in the people before April this year. He made these comments after commencing his duties for the New Year. Minister Johnston Fernando mentioned that the stretch of the Southern Expressway was opened because the work had been completed. There are many issues in it. But he said they expected to complete the entire work of the Expressway from Matara to Hambanthota during the first quarter of this year. He revealed that it is intended to declare open the Expressway before the Sinhala and Tamil New Year.
